    • Method Detail

      • queryMaxNumber

        public static int queryMaxNumber()
        The function query the max the slot in this smart card reader.
        Returns:
        value < 0 : error code, value == 0 : not defined, value > 0 ; number of slot.

      • queryPresence

        public static int queryPresence(int nSlotIndex)
        The function query whether the smart card is not existent Attention : not every slot can support this function.
        Parameters:
        nSlotIndex - : Slot index, from 0 to ( MAX_SUPPORT_SLOT - 1 )
        Returns:
        value < 0 : error code, value == 0 : not existent, value > 0 ; be existent.

      • open

        public static int open(int nSlotIndex)
        The function open the specified card.
        Parameters:
        nSlotIndex - : Slot index, from 0 to (MAX_SUPPORT_SLOT - 1).
        Returns:
        value < 0 : error code, value >= 0: success, return value is a handle.This handle will be employed bye other API as an input parameter

      • close

        public static int close(int handle)
        The function initialize the smart card reader.
        Parameters:
        handle - : returned from method of open.
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code.

      • setCardInfo

        public static int setCardInfo(int handle,
              int nBuadrate,
              int nVoltage)
        Set PSAM card baudrate and validate.
        Parameters:
        handle - returned from method of open。
        nBuadrate - value is 9600 or 38400.
        nVoltage - value is 1, 2, 3 means 1.8v, 3v, 5v.

      • powerOn

        public static int powerOn(int handle,
          byte[] byteArrayATR,
          SmartCardSlotInfo info)
        Power on the smart card in the slot opened before.
        Parameters:
        Handle - : returned from method of open.
        byteArrayATR - : ATR
        info - : card information
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : ATR length value < 0 : error code

      • powerOff

        public static int powerOff(int handle)
        Power off the smart card in the slot opened before.
        Parameters:
        handle - : return from method of open
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • setSlotInfo

        public static int setSlotInfo(int handle,
              SmartCardSlotInfo info)
        The function set the slot control information
        Parameters:
        Handle - ：return from method of open
        info - ：SmartCardSlotInfo
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • transmit

        public static int transmit(int handle,
           byte[] byteArrayAPDU,
           byte[] byteArrayResponse)
        The function sends a command Application Protocol Data Unit(APDU) to a card and retrieve the response APDU, plus the status words SW1 and SW2.
        Parameters:
        Handle - : return from method of open
        byteArrayAPDU - : command of APDU
        byteArrayResponse - : response of command of APDU
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : response data length value < 0 : error code

      • read

        public static int read(int handle,
       int nAreaType,
       byte[] byteArryData,
       int nStartAddress)
        This function is responsible for reading data from memory card
        Parameters:
        handle, - return from method of open.
        nAreaType, - area type : 0 : main memory, 1 : protected memory 2 : security memory
        byteArryData - : data buffer
        nStartAddress - : starting address
        Returns:
        value : < 0 : error code >= 0 : data length

      • write

        public static int write(int handle,
        int nAreaType,
        byte[] byteArryData,
        int nStartAddress)
        This function is responsible for writing data to memory card.
        Parameters:
        handle, - return from method of open.
        nAreaType, - area type : 0 : main memory, 1 : protected memory 2 : security memory。
        byteArryData - : data buffer。
        nStartAddress - : starting address。
        Returns:
        value : < 0 : error code >= 0 : data length

      • verify

        public static int verify(int handle,
         byte[] byteArrayAPDU)
        Verification of data
        Parameters:
        handle, - return from method of open
        byteArrayAPDU - : data buffer
        Returns:
        value : < 0 : error code = 0 : failed in verifying data > 0 : success

      • verify_extend

        public static int verify_extend(int handle,
                byte[] byteArrayAPDU,
                int nAddress)
        Verification of data, for AT88SC102 card
        Parameters:
        handle - : return from method of open
        byteArrayAPDU - : data buffer
        nAddress: - 1. 80 Security Code。 2. 688 Application Zone 1 Erase Key. 3. 1248 Application Zone 2 Erase Key。
        Returns:
        value : < 0 : error code, >= 0: success.

      • touch

        public static int touch(int handle)
        Deprecated. Check whether this is a card on the smart card reader return value : == 0 : no card >0 : find a card <0 : error code

        nEvent -
        nData -
